alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fort Bend and south central Harris Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sharpstown, or near Bellaire, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Sugar Land, Missouri City, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Spring Branch North, Mission Bend, Town West, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West, Spring Valley, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, southeastern Addicks Park Ten, southwestern Memorial Park, Meadows Place and Hedwig Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
